This file contains statistics on the full population for all measurements in a measurement concept list that have a value as number:
- **measurement_concept_id**: The concept_id in the vocabulary for this measurement
- **measurement_name**: The name of the measurement as defined in the vocabulary
- **measurement_unit**: The unit of this measurement for which the statistics are provided
- **n_records**: The number of records included in the statistics
- **px_values**: the x percentile of the value. Note that P0 equals the minimum value and P100 equals the maximum value

If a cell contains <n the actual number is too small to share based on governance rules for small cell counts.
